strapiEvent.name: Summer Movie Series
strapiEvent.description:
S﻿UMMER FAMILY MOVIES

There will be FREE popcorn. Snacks such as candy and soda pop and bottled water will be available for purchase. Cash ONLY.

Bring your own bean bag chair or picnic blanket or feel free to use our chairs. All three running shows for each date will all start at 1:15 pm. See running times for each week listed below.

J﻿uly 12th BENJI -1 hour 27 minutes

J﻿uly 19th PAN - 1 hour 51 minutes

J﻿uly 26th TROLLS -1 hour 33

Sponsored by The Apollo on Emma and Dancenhance Entertainment 

Adults $5

Kids $3
